io.sphere.client.exceptions

Class SphereBackendException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.sphere.client.SphereClientException
            • io.sphere.client.exceptions.SphereException
              • io.sphere.client.exceptions.SphereBackendException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SphereBackendException
extends SphereException
    Generic exception thrown when a Sphere web service responds with a status code other than HTTP 2xx.
    See Also:
